section.title: How to use headwordTranslation in a multilingual lexicographic resource
section.para: This is an entry from a hypothetical Irish-multilingual dictionary.

example.title: Pseudocode
example.programlisting: - entry (id: fómhar-n, headword: fómhar) - sense (id: fómhar-n-1) - headwordTranslation (langCode: en, text: autumn) - headwordTranslation (langCode: en, text: fall) - headwordTranslation (langCode: de, text: Herbst) - headwordTranslation (langCode: cs, text: podzim) - sense (id: fómhar-n-2) - headwordTranslation (langCode: en, text: harvest) - headwordTranslation (langCode: de, text: Ernte) - headwordTranslation (langCode: cs, text: sklizeň)

example.title: XML
